name: Mors Crate
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys - Movement

Q - Quit to title

R - Restart/retry level

How to play:

Use the arrow keys to move one tile at a time, and squish your clone between a crate and a hard place 3 times over to win.

For Windows users, an EXE file is provided in the zip, but for other OS's (Mac, Linux, etc.) you'll need a compatible Python 3 version and pygame.
